question: Show all newspapers and magazines with a 20k circulation.
sql_query1:
SELECT Periodicals.name 
FROM Periodicals
WHERE (Periodicals.type = "Newspaper" OR Periodicals.type = "Magazine") AND Periodicals.circulation_numbers = 20000
sql_query2:
SELECT Periodicals.name 
FROM Periodicals
WHERE Periodicals.type = "Newspaper" OR Periodicals.type = "Magazine" AND Periodicals.circulation_numbers = 20000
interpretation1: Show both newspapers and magazines where either have a 20k circulation.
interpretation2: Show all the newspapers, also show the magazines with a 20k circulation.
